https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5V42cVUhKzGiL1WEgWFXMcMZl7D.jpg Provocative, funny and profoundly moving, Bastardy is the inspirational story of a self proclaimed Robin Hood of the streets. For Forty years and with infectious humour and optimism, Jack Charles has juggled a life of crime with another successful career- acting Bastardy
